Blog.post: well yesterday i woke up and watched grind for like the 5th or 6th time. whoo! suprise suprise...lol i pretty much did nuthin durin the day. talked 2 shaina some bout it. that nite us and the furgrams went out to rivergate. cody didnt bc he was at kortnies. my daddy needed to get my mom somethin 4 her burthday so me my mama, bobbi, and brody split up from charlie and daddy. we stayed in teh pets store for like a half hour! i love dogs. i jus wanna take em all home!!! we went into claires and looked at all the jewelry and stuff. i wanted this belt the same one they have in hot topic but cheaper! i didnt get it tho. ill wait. ill get my grandma to get it 4 me. *he he* my mom saw these sox that she wanted they had lil basketballs on the top of them. they were cute. and she saw these earrings that she wanted they were lil flip flop shoes earings. bobbi bought them 4 my mama (shhh she doesnt noe yet. its 4 her burthday) we went and ate after that. i had chinese...mmmmmm! i went to hot topic after that. MY FAVORITE STORE EVER!! WHOO! i got a new cuff bracelet, some happy bunny paper, and a pen. we came home after that and i watched grind for the 3rd time that day. like the 8th time ive seen it period in like 4 or 5 days. wat can i say.....its my favorite movie! well not much else to say. bye bye
urlLink UNWRITTEN LAW!!!! WHOO!!! gotta love em! urlLink
urlLink CKY...the best band! (besides P.O.D and Hoobastank)!!!! urlLink
urlLink BAM!!!! in the best movie on earth (besides anchorman) GRIND!!!! whoo! urlLink

well yesterday i talked to cody 4 a lil while. i called gram and asked her wen we were goin bak-2-skool shoppin and she said well do u wanna go today? i said sure! so later on we went. i got some jeans and bout 8 shirts. theyre awesome! i came home and got on the computer. me n kort and colleen and need to go to the sk8park together! they go but i wanna go with em! kortnie said itd be fun so we will one of these days....yesterday was an alrite day......skools starts soon...damn it! well must be goin......heres a quote 4 u 2 think about today! "wat would u do it 4? i noe! a Klondike bar!!!! u mother fuckers are fat!!!!"

well lets see on monday charlie and cody came 2 pick me up then we went to get colleen and kort. we all were goin to the mall. we had so much fun!!!!! me n colleen went and got some coffee at barnes and noble. some chik knew her. she was like "arent u matts sister" {stalker?} creepy....kort yells "somebody masturebate me!" hahaha omg.lol!!!! then we were jumpin on the keyboard carpet and the damn thing wouldnt make noise so we were stopmin on it yellin u bastard!!! lol colleen went and bought modest mouse cd! theyre awesome!!! u should really listen 2 em sometime. then we decided that we wanted to go see anchorman. thats the best movie!!! some ppl tried to tell me it wasnt worth the money and its stupid and shit. UR FUCKING RETARDED!! so if anyone tries to tell u not to see it jus tell em to fuck off! i liked brick...he pooped a hammerand a tape recorder! hahah! we left lil b4 10. we stopped at mcdonalds but i wouldnt go in bymyself lol {ppl have been shot at ntie in mcdonalds... eek!!} me colleen and kort got chicken sammiches but i gave them my fries after i had had some i didnt want ALL of em. then charlie took me home and i watched grind. thats one of the best fucking movies ever!!!!!!!!! u should seriously see it!! well thats all...i must go now and have fun...but not 2 much u naughty person!!!! *Hope*
urlLink It be Bam and Chad!!!!! its CKY!!! WHOO! urlLink

well sunday was a GREAT day!!! cody was commin bak! yay! i got on the computer a lil bit tho b4 i left. talked 2 some people and got sum updates on the us open. basically the schedules all in all. around 215 charlie, bobbi, brody, and kortnie came 2 pick me up. we stayed at my house 4 about 20 minutes. then it was off to MTSU!!! we were goin to watch his exibition. they were good! he was sooooo nervous! he didnt noe me n kortnie were commin tho...*he he* then on the ride home cody told us AAAAALLLLL bout his camp! he walked like 50 miles lol ow! then we all went bak 2 my house and ate. we had chicken and dumplins! yumm! homemade! and we watched along came polly! my 2nd time! lol then we jus pretty much goofed around they left around 10 sumthin. o well..we had fun! then i watched the RCA championships that i taped from earlier bc i was gonna be gone wen it was on! any won whoo!!! started out the match with a 143 mph ace!!!!! whoo!!!! im so happy! he won the rca chamionships!....u noe wat RCA stand 4 now dont u....... R ODDICK is C HAMPION A GAIN!!!!!!! yes! lol us open starts august 30! LIVE!! andys birthday 2! whoo! well thats bout it that happened i had a great day!!! *loves 2 all* *Hope*

hey hey!!!! today is a good day so far! we woke up (me kort and brody) and had doughnuts!! mmm! wat was funny was we all woke up at the SAME time.....freaky....lol charlie said we looked like 3 lil prairie dogs hahah! then bobbi came out and was going nuts!!!! the spiderman2 movie wouldnt work in her room so shes like CAN I PLEEEEASE watch it in here! we said yea sure no prob! lol so we watched that then brody started playin with kortnies hair lol he has a hair feddish lol we didnt go swimmin at ms.foxes tho....o well *sad* anywho, kortnies mom came 2 pick her up around 1130 or 12 they stayed 4 about a half hour then she left *sad* i love kortnie shes SO awesome! i watched the RCA championships on NBC! andy was playin! {if u dont noe who he is hes the guy ALLLL over this blog haha} i was freakin out! he played flat the first set and started pickin up the 2nd! he made an aceat 147 mph!!! omg!! i would be sooo freaked if that ws commin at me! then he and ljubicci {i think thats how u spell it?} had a tie break after the second set THEN he came bak!!!!!! 3rd set rocked!!! go andy! he won! WHOO! he faces someone (whoever wins in the other semi's) in the RCA championship finals!! whoo! then we went home (2 my house) and we r havin shrimp, green beans, sweet tators, corn, and some kinda cake bobbi made!! yummy!!!!! amber (my brothers gurlfriend) well her brother (hes 16) is spendin the nite 2nite....4 some odd reason him and my brother r like best friends now...strange...they are NUTHING alike lol. well later that nite we watched my babys daddy! omg that movie is so funny! thats the second time ive seen it tho. anywayz, they all had decided that i am phoebe from friends!!! haha! i can see me like that 2....i watched chasing liberty later that nite as well...it was good! it was really cute! i liked it! well thats bout all that happened! codys commin bak 2day!! (im writin the rest of this on sunday {all this happened saturday}) yay!! i miss cody! im gonna see his routine well me n kortnie are but i must go get ready and take a shower and ness buh byez! *Hope*
urlLink ANDY AT THE RCA CHAMPS!! WHOO! HE WON!! urlLink

i sat around codys house and jus did not much. watched tv pretty much it. then they told me they were takin cody a lil goody basket so i wrote him a note and stuck it in thr lol. then they came bak from runnin an airen and yelled "HOOOPE C'MEER WE BROT U A FRIEND" i was wonderin...huh?? then i saw kortnie!!! yay!!! i luv kortnie shes so cool! she wrote cody a lil somethin on the note lol he was mighty happy! we looked at pictures from wen the boiz were little...CODY WAS ADORABLE! hahah wait till he hears lol its alright hes seen me lol. then we made some madlibs lol omg they were soooooo funny! hahaha kortnies birthday 1 was the funniest! lol then we went to my house and ate dinner! we had hotdogs, italian sausages, and mac-n-cheese. mmmm it was yummi!!! kortnie had 2 servings lol she liked it! me n her watched our 8th grade graduation video! it was soooo funny! then we watched the funny home video from wen i was video! she cracked up! lol then amber came in and watched some....kris got mad..hhaha o well!!!!! tough cookies!! well we went to kortnies house bc me n her were gonna spend the nite at codys that nite!!! lol no cody...o well we had fun!! we went to her house to get her things. then we left and went to codys. we watched spiderman2 (id already seen it 2ce) and along came polly. that is soooooo funny! we fell asleep eventually. round 2 i would say lol we had sooooo much fun!! lol we tried invitin batty 2 come but she didnt want to...*sighs* o well...well thats bout it! *loves and hugs* *Hope*

hey hey people!! I HAD A DRIVIN LESSON FROM MY DADDY TODAY WHOO!!! he took me up 2 the church. i have a problem with turnin but im AWESOME with parkin! lol i did good! i asked him if i was better than my brother wen he took him 4 his first lesson and he said im more CAUTIOUS lol well atleast thats somethin lol well Later the Furgrams came over and i went with em to take cody to cheer camp at MTSU!! *sad* we saw his dorm room it was alright....only guy TOOOOOOONS of gurls lol *heaven 4 a man* haha well we all told him bye then we went bak to my house to get my stuff. i was spendin the nite at his house that nite lol..funny my best friend is not thr and i spend the nite hahaha lol. well we went to sonic after that. i got popcorn chicken, tators and a strawberri cream slush! mmmmm lol then we went bak to thr house. i watched big brother 5 with bobbi (codys mom) first time i EVER watched big brother.. she got me into it. gosh durn her lol now i have another show to keep up with lol o well. after that we popped in my home video that i brot. {i figured theyd wanna see it} O MAN!!! that made their nite!!!!! SOOOOOOOO FUNNY! i wont share any details bout the video tho...lol cody called. some woman kicked him out of the dorms.. AUGH bc hes a boi! (he was roomin with one of his male coaches sooooooo they dont want bois in the dorm with a bunch of gurls) SO WAT!! one of the MAIN reasons u go 2 camp is to BOND hows he gonna if hes not even near his squad! well later me n brody (codys lil brother) watched some tv! thats bout it! *loves and hugs* *Hope*
urlLink ANDY!!!.....have to keep him at the top! *loves* urlLink
urlLink ah......its andy *sighs* again..... urlLink
urlLink andreychuck!! finally got it waitin 22 years!!! no one deserves this more than him!!! yay!!! go tampa! urlLink
urlLink SCOTTIE WALKER!!! WHOO! urlLink
urlLink SCOTTIE!!!!!!!! urlLink
urlLink Its Vladi!!! i love him! hes awesome! urlLink
urlLink KNOCK THAT SISSY DOWN ADAM!!!! urlLink
urlLink ITS OUR CUTE LIL ROOKIE!!! urlLink
urlLink its st.louis!!! yay!! urlLink
urlLink LOOKIN COOL!!!!.........SO SEXY!!!! AH! urlLink
urlLink I JUST CANT GET ENOUGH OF HIM!!!! urlLink
urlLink SEXY ANDY!!!! again.....lol urlLink

today i did nothing...last nite i watched dude wheres my car tho lol i love that movie! idn how many times ive seen it lol ""Its a barn" "is it red?" "no" "then its not a barn"" hahaha so funny...."SHIBBY" lol anyways...i need to say sumthing......*clears throat* BATTY STARTED THIS TREND !!!!THE BLOGSITE TREND! YES SHE DID... WE ALL COPIED WE R JUS SUM COPY CATTERS! lol sara and kort and i actually made one bc we wanted to write down wat we did durin the day and i wanted to put pics on it as well. eveyrtime i try makin a site it never works but this one did so yay! i actually signed up so i could post a comment in battys but yea anyway SHE WAS FIRST!!! props 2 her!!!!! o yea... shaina said she did really good today at soccer try-outs for mcg!!! yay! hope she makes it! wish her luck!!! ive seen the espy awards 4 this year.....3 times....lol im such a dork lol i love sports...wat do ya expect. well not really anything happened today....but can u tell im obsessed with andy roddick......who wouldnt be....hes got GREEEAT abs(my favorite), HES SEXY!!!, and plays my favorite sport.........*sighs*....lol im not all the way obsessed i jus love lookin at him and watchin him play.....lol well gotsa run! not literally but u get the pic! *LOVES* FINITO *Hope*
urlLink andy.....again......andy roddick....i am obsessed but gosh darn it!!! who wouldnt be! i love him hes a GREAAAAAT athlete and so sexy!!!! lol urlLink
urlLink maria sharapova! won the wimbeldon....against serena! serenas heart jus isnt in it anymore...and everyone says maria is the new IT gurl! urlLink
urlLink andy roddick again......i jus love him.....actually...watchin him got me into tennis...who woulda known lol! urlLink
urlLink wat can i say.........im obsessed.....lol...andy roddick again! urlLink
urlLink i miss the happy couple!!! andy -n- mandy! see they even rhyme...augh! gosh darn them! they shouldnt have broken up! they were sooo cute!!!!....o well urlLink
urlLink andy....*sighs*.....hes a doll.... urlLink
urlLink ITS ANDY!!!! THE SEXIEST MAN EVER IN THIS WORLD!!!! (also my fave tennis player) ahhh!! urlLink
urlLink JOHHNY DEPP!!! hes so....beautiful lol urlLink
urlLink I wanna dye my hair this color!!! urlLink

well i woke up this mornin around....uhh idn i guess around 8:15. i didnt really do anything today. my daddy came home from the dentist and he had a ROOT CANAL!!! blahh!! well his whole mouth was numb!!! OW! well i cleaned my room up some....still searchin 4 a place 4 me to take tennis lessons...i noe how 2 play bc ive played b4 but i jus want to noe the rite technique 4 MCG. shaina was goin on 4 soccer at Mcg! yay!! hope she made it!!!!!! not much happened today.......quite boring........o! i did watch a bunch of home videos from wen i was little! it was funny!!!! well i gotta go! bout 2 go watch dude wheres my car!!!! gotta love that movie!!!! *LOVES* FINITO *Hope*

well today i woke up and ate sausage!!!! it was yummy!!!! today cody was 14!!! well i called sara to see if she could come with me to the castner knott reunion at civitan! she could so i went and told my parents she could...gram came over shortly after that. she brot a big box over! it was of LOTS of pictures from us wen we were little...so cute! we left to go to the reunion! thr were TONS of ppl thr! i saw ms.peggy! wen i was like 8 i used to go into her office and hang out with her alll the time she was like the boss type person lol i saw lotsa ppl that knew me wen i was little i didnt get to see melissa tho....she was my favorite i was in her fashion shows! lol yay! i did see janie jessi and tyler! i grew up with them! their jessi (or jessika) and tyler are like my brother and sister and janie is like an aunt to me. jessi jus graduated and tyler's gonna be a junior! jessi said shed help me with my tennis! whoo!! well we went over and listened to these ppl speak then we went and had castner knott cake! it was nummy! lol then i went and sat bak down. then Caroline came!! shes a family friend that used to work with my mom...we still keep in touch....lol she brot this yummy dessert it was some sort of strawberry thing with blueberries and such! it was good!!! well it was gettting really hott and a lil late so we said bye to everyone and left. later the furgrams came over! lol i wished cody a happy burthday! {i think hes happy bout his new celly} lol well they (the A-dults) were tryin 2 figure out wat to fix 4 supper and they were sayin all this stuff that i dont like {im picky...:) } well they decided on red beans and rice with some kinda sausage in it i was like RED BEANS AND RICE! YUCK! THE ONE FOOD I DONT LIKE!! so grammy went and took me and the bois to subway! it was good! i came bak and watched little rascals!!! OTAY!!!! lol i love that movie! the espy awards were commin on that nite!!! whoo!! it was good i watched the whole thing! FUNNY 2!!! wat jamey fox did 2 serena lol! classic!!!! lol spankin him wit the racket! lol haha! well it was a good nite but i watched IT....................:( im VERY coulrophobic...i thot if i watched the WHOLE thing my fear would be gone....it was worse bc of that! i cried and shook the whole movie....it was bad...im not a baby jus VERY coulrophobic! hey!! johnny d is 2!! lol well thats pretty much all that happened yesterday! gotsa run. well not run but yea u get the picture! *LOVES* FINITO *Hope*

yay!!! it twas codys burthday party!!! i was thr and colleen and kortnie and my parents, jessica lane and her friend victoria and then sara came later and my brother was thr and then kyle was thr but i kept forgettin he was bc he didnt say anything! lol we had fun!!! i got thr and colleen and kortnie were thr and so were jessica and victoria...see cody jessi and tori cheer 2gether and i noe tori and cody like each other but alot of us didnt like tori..o well....we didnt tell....but anywho wen my brother got thr we all thot it was kyle but it wasnt and then tori followed cody out to my bros car....{why???} then she was flirtin with my brother the whole time well switchin with him and cody i was like WTF hes 18!! and then we found out she was 12!!!! goin into 7th grade.....whoa!!! anywho we watched my babys daddy but the stupid thing kept skippin scenes but it was okay it was really funny!! we had hotdogs and tato-chips and n&n's lol!! they were good!! then we had honeybun cake!! yay! yummy!!! lol tori.....goodness.....she didnt noe wat a honeybun was and she didnt noe wat an inside jokes was...hmmm.... well! i brought over texas chainsaw massacre (seen it 3 times and STILL scares me!!!) everyone was soooo jumpy!! it was funni!!! it scared batty! can u believe it!!! BATTY!!.....WHOA!!! lol! it was gross 2...u can tell it grossed ppl out! with eyeballs and ppl hangin on hooks tryin 2 get off the hooks and then he fell bak on the hook......OOOOOWWWW!!!! makes ur bak hurt seein it... :/ but anywayz o i forgot my brother said to charlie (about kyle) "why's the lil ghetto kid so quiet?" AHAHAHAHAHAHA kyle??? quiet....he was jus shy..lol! we watched goldmember well sorta....some of em hadnt seen it and this was after tori left... :) lol o!! BTW! forgot.....it was funny...colleen, kortnie, sara, jessi, me, and brody all got in the bathroom in the shower! {not wat ur thinkin} and then jessi said somethin bout IT commin out the shower thing (the evil clown) i was like NOOO dont mention that im coulrophobic!! lol we all piled out and watched certain scenes from goldmember! well i left soon and said byes to everyone! i miss them all!!! but i came home and went to sleep... and that was codys burthday party!!!! *LOVES* FINITO *Hope*

hello!!! well yesterday shaina spend the nite!! we went to go pick her up and then we went to hollywoodvideo and rented some movies we rented scary movie 3 and texas chainsaw massacre!! (she'd never seen them) she screamed bloody murder on a part!! it was funny!!!!! hahaa well amber(his gf) let kris(my brother) open the presents from her. she got him this game for ps2 that hes been wantin and some cacky shorts! we had a fun nite!!! we couldnt stop laughin and then we bumped our heads it hurt but it was funny! we had pizza and pigged out on that and chocolate cake! it was nummy!!!! she left today had to go 2 out with her mama!! but tomorrow is codys burthday!!! yay!!!!! i noe wat hes gettin but shhhhh i cant tell!!!!!!! gotsa go! *LOVES* FINITO *Hope*

yay!!!!! today is my brothers birthday! hes finally 18!! well i woke up and did nothing. later that day i had to wrap his present. we got him these new shoes he wanted they r cool lookin! wen he got home he showed us all his cards he got at work...ALOT!!!! then we got ready 4 dinner! we went to chiles..mmmmmmmm lol it was me, my grandma, her finance that dont ever talk, my mama, my daddy, my brother, and his gurlfriend!! we had fun our waiter was cute except 4 the fact thr was sumthin wrong with his teeth....... :/ anywho later we came home and he opened his gifts! i got him a blue coffee mug!!! lol hes been wantin one he got his shows and a new stereo 4 his car! it was a good burthday! we had choco cake it was yummy!!! overall it was a good day! that was pretty much all that happened! gotsa go! *LOVES* FINITO *Hope*

well yesterday was a pretty boring day! i pretty much jus laid around. later on that day i had to study my driving book. i realized wat kinda car i want! (BTW) lol i want a '99 or '00 Dodge Neon! red or silver or black....NICE! 4 the first car it is! well it stormed sooooooooooooooo bad yesterday!!!!! the furlines had a tree knocked down! power was out EVERYWHERE! luckily ours didnt go out but cody bobbi charlie and brody had to come over and stay the nite bc they had no power and they were roasting! it was fun tho! me n the boiz watched spiderman but i fell asleep. thats pretty much all that happened yesterday! see....boring day....... my brothers burthday is 2morrow! the 15th!! gonna be 18!! yay! lol well i must go now! *loves* FINITO *HOPE*

well i woke up early today...o well i bobbi came 2 pick me up and then we picked up pugalugs!! lol he was soo happy lol then mrs foxxy lol came with ray-ray and picked me and cody up and we went and helped her move furniture lol.......wasnt fun! but i love ms.fox lol we made it fun lol! she bot us lunch....it was nummy! then she took us home but i went bak 2 codys and watched the last half of my soap! days!!! bobbi filled me in with wat i misssed....then me n bobbi went to aldys! it was funny bc i had never been and i saw a lil thing on the grocery cart and it had the long band with a buckle type thing at the end and on the thing on top said 25 cents i was like u have to pay 4 a grocery cart!?!? shes like yea only a quarter but iget it bak lol i was like oooo but then i asked in the car ride thr y did she bring grocery sax and she said they dont have bags i was like omg lol then we wwen we left the store we got into the car i was like omg we were like the only white ppl in that store!!! krazy! wat kinda grocery store is that!!!! MEXI-KANS!!! lol she said cheap good stuff! lol it was funny then i went bak 2 her house and hung out and i met codys friend kendel shes real cool and super nice! shes really pretty 2! we scrd her with this site lol it was funny i had to babysit codys brother brody while he went to cheer practice bc my parents and codys parents (best friends) went out 2 dinner with my teachers from last year...isnt that weird!!! we played hi ho cherrio and guess who!! i had fun lol childish fun! i wanted to spend the nite with cody...they wouldnt let me lol hes my brother idn y!! my parents and codys parents came bak and they acted drunk! but they werent they were jus havin such a good time they brot it bak with em! lol then charlie brot me my mom and dad home and we discussed ANNNNNOTHER vacation they want us to go on together! jeez by the time im 20 we'll of gone all around the world with how many theyre plannin! we had a fun ride home bc i told charlie (im soo blonde and i dont think at all!) lol he noes that and takes that in2 consideration with me all the time lol its funny but anywayz on the ride home i had rememberd somethin i had dne wen i was younger i was mailin a letter to santa clause and we had no stamps so i got some paper and drew and colored a flag 2 a piece of paper and tape it on thr and put it in the mail box......lol silly me i didnt noe i couldnt mail it! luckily my neighbor who we're good friends with is my mailman (my daddy is too but he doesnt do our neighborhood) well he cracked up about it and bot a stamp and put it on thr 4 me! lol i was so embarrassed! well then im here.....well thats pretty much wat happened 2day! love u's! ~Finito~ *HOPE*

hey!! my first blogger! yay!!! lol well....today was an awesome day! i woke up and got ready and i spent the whole day with amber! my brothers gurlfriend. shes cool! we went shopping at rivergate! it was soo much fun! we made a friend cashier at aeropastle! hes so cool! hes a yankees fan 2! lol coolness! lol i love the yankees! but i said i liked tennis better than baseball and i liked hockey too! lol he thot i was some tomboi! i was like me.....yea rite lol! anywayz the furgrums came bak into town 2day! they missed us! we missed them 2! we had lotsa chitchats! lol lol!!!we pigged out on sum chili! well...im still single...ive dated a lot of jerks...so im so used to jerks and i hate it.i wanna nice go who im attracted to and who'll make me laugh. is that so much 2 ask! lol well gota go! °LOVES° Finito *HOPE*
